PayPal just lost its Chinese partner. TBOW now the mobile pay go to company. TBOW 10-Q tuesday

Message.Title: TBOW: PayPal out in China.....TBOW in
Message.Msg: TBOW: Mobile payment. PayPal out in China. This situation is worth putting on the radar. Very little press given to PayPal being frozen out of China last week. It appears to be a repeat of the Google and Yahoo problems in cracking the China market. Basically, the government has no intention of allowing outsiders to get a piece of the mammoth mobile and online payment business in China. Take a look at this news link and the last paragraph that I cut and pasted noting that the gigantic ChinaUnionPay stands to benefit. TBOW and ChinaUnionPay are partners. Imo, this is very big news that has simply gone under reported. PayPal loses China partner: LINK http://www.techinasia.com/paypal-dhgate-partnership-ends/ NOTE- TBOW 10-Q due Tuesday. http://markets.on.nytimes.com/research/stocks/news/press_release.asp?docTag=201208080700PR_NEWS_USPRX____CN54182&feedID=600&press_symbol=29708084 NOTE 2: Imo, TBOW will turn in a positive 10-Q showing top and bottom line growth. Also, a surprise to the upside on the EPS is likely, imo.
